Name: Maverta City
About the game: Maverta City - minimalist, relaxing, motion logic, mind game. The player's goal is to survive the labyrinth and save the mates. FEATURES: - 300 levels and 50 challenges - Unique gameplay - Mind games - Motion logic - Adaptive hint system - More than 25 languages
